mapper.select: SELECT D.DONA_NO, D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, D.DONA_TITLE, D.DONA_CONTENT, D.DONA_REGIDATE, D.DONA_UPDATEDATE, C.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_DONA D JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER C ON D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = C.CENTER_MEMBER_NO ORDER BY D.DONA_REGIDATE DESC

SELECT D.DONA_NO, D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, D.DONA_TITLE, D.DONA_CONTENT, D.DONA_REGIDATE, D.DONA_UPDATEDATE, C.CENTER_MEMBER_ID, C.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_DONA D JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER C ON D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = C.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE D.DONA_NO = #{donaNo} ORDER BY D.DONA_REGIDATE DESC

SELECT D.DONA_NO, D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, D.DONA_TITLE, D.DONA_CONTENT, D.DONA_REGIDATE, D.DONA_UPDATEDATE, C.CENTER_MEMBER_ID, C.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME, CM.DONA_COMMENT_NO, CM.DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, CM.DONA_COMMENT_REGIDATE, CM.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER FROM ( SELECT DONA_NO, CENTER_MEMBER_NO, DONA_TITLE, DONA_CONTENT, DONA_REGIDATE, DONA_UPDATEDATE, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT D.DONA_NO, D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, D.DONA_TITLE, D.DONA_CONTENT, D.DONA_REGIDATE, D.DONA_UPDATEDATE FROM TBL_DONA D ORDER BY D.DONA_REGIDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) D JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER C ON D.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = C.CENTER_MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_DONA_COMMENT CM ON D.DONA_NO = CM.DONA_NO WHERE D.RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT dc.DONA_COMMENT_NO, dc.DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, dc.DONA_COMMENT_REGIDATE, CASE WHEN MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 THEN m.MEMBER_NAME WHEN MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 THEN cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME END AS COMMENT_WRITER_NAME FROM TBL_DONA_COMMENT dc LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 1 AND dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER cm ON MOD(dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER, 10) = 2 AND dc.DONA_COMMENT_WRITER = cm.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE dc.DONA_NO = #{donaNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_DONA_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_DONA_COMMENT(DONA_COMMENT_NO, DONA_COMMENT_CONTENT, DONA_NO, DONA_COMMENT_WRITER) VALUES (#{donaCommentNo}, #{donaCommentContent}, #{donaNo}, #{donaCommentWriter})
